welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calumet City, where the city's charm and rich history awaits. Known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines and Porter Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is where all commercial flights operate from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Porter County Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Chicago O'hare, serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Home to Delta Air Lines and its partner airlines, this terminal offers domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at Chicago O'hare, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.
